author: Clyde
long_description:
Point Of Interest is a mod, where Player, who have the priv interact, can visit Points of Interest in a List.
You can filter the List by some categories.
The Admin of an Server can give Players the priv poi, this Player can than set new Points or edit, delete, rename etc. the
Points.
Easy traveling with a Formspec, where User with the priv poi can work on the Points on a extended Formspec.
Admins can delete Points over the extended Formspec.
name: poi
short_description: Mod to create or visit Points of Interest
title: Points of Interest
